member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.IndeterminateIndicatorWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the level of indicator in indeterminate state.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.IndicatorCornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the corner radius of the .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.AnimationEasing
member.summary: Gets or sets the easing function to apply for linear and circular progress bar animation and it applies when the is true.
member.remarks: The works only when the is true.
member.example:
Below example shows how to set animation duration for linear and circular progressbar.
<Syncfusion:SfLinearProgressBar AnimationDuration="0:0:3" IsIndeterminate="True" Progress="75" > <Syncfusion:SfLinearProgressBar.AnimationEasing> <QuarticEase EasingMode = "EaseOut" /> </ Syncfusion:SfLinearProgressBar.AnimationEasing> </Syncfusion:SfLinearProgressBar> <Syncfusion:SfCircularProgressBar AnimationDuration="0:0:3" IsIndeterminate="True" Progress="75" > <Syncfusion:SfCircularProgressBar.AnimationEasing> <QuarticEase EasingMode = "EaseOut" /> </ Syncfusion:SfCircularProgressBar.AnimationEasing> </Syncfusion:SfCircularProgressBar>

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.IsIndeterminate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether progress bar is in indeterminate state.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.SegmentCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a count of the segments in progress bar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.GapWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines gap between the segments.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.ProgressColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the progress indicator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.Progress
member.summary: Gets or sets the progress value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum range value of the progress bar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum range value of the progress bar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.TrackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the track.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.AnimationDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration for completing one animation cycle and it applies when the is true.
member.value: The default value is 3000 milli seconds.
member.remarks: The works only when is true.
member.example:
Below example shows how to set animation duration for linear and circular progressbar.
<Syncfusion:SfLinearProgressBar AnimationDuration="0:0:3" IsIndeterminate="True" Progress="75" /> <Syncfusion:SfCircularProgressBar AnimationDuration="0:0:3" IsIndeterminate="True" Progress="75" />

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.RangeColors
member.summary: Gets or sets the colors with range.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.SecondaryProgress
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the secondary progress which is useful for displaying intermediate progress, such as the buffer level during a streaming playback progress bar.
member.remarks: The range of secondary progress bar is between 0 and 100.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBase.SecondaryProgressColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the secondary progress indicator.

member.summary: Gets or sets the shape of marker in .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.SfStepProgressBar.ItemSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the spacing between the adjacent step view items in .

remarks.para: The control arranges its items based on . The works only when the is . The single step size is calculated using and or based on . The applies between the current step view item and previous step view item.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.SfStepProgressBar.SelectedIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the last active (selected) item where items before this index will moved to active status.

remarks.para: The is a zero-index property and sets the last active (selected) step view item. Based on the property, the last selected item will be in active or indeterminate or inactive status. The items before the selected index will be in active status and the item after the selected index will be in inactive status.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.SfStepProgressBar.SelectedItemStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates the of last active (selected) .
member.remarks: The last selected item displays or or status based on .

members.member:
Gets or sets a brush that describes the connector (line that connecting neighboring step view items) color for active .
The works when the is or status. .

Gets or sets a brush that describes the connector color of .
The works when the status is . .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.SfStepProgressBar.SelectedItemProgress
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates the progress of .

remarks.para: The works only when the is or . When is , the progress will always 100% regardless of this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.SfStepProgressBar.MinimumItemSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates the minimum space between the step view items when is Fill.

remarks.para: When the is , the space between the items sized to fill the available space. if the calculated spacing is less than the , then the minimum item spacing is used.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ProgressBar.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects
member.summary: Easing effects for progress animation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.BounceIn
member.summary: Jumps towards, and then bounces as it settles at the final value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.BounceOut
member.summary: Leaps to final values, bounces 3 times, and settles.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.CubicIn
member.summary: Starts slowly and accelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.CubicInOut
member.summary: Accelerates and decelerates. Often a natural-looking choice.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.CubicOut
member.summary: Starts quickly and the decelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.Linear
member.summary: Linear transformation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SinIn
member.summary: Smoothly accelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SinInOut
member.summary: Accelerates in and decelerates out.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SinOut
member.summary: Smoothly decelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SpringIn
member.summary: Moves away and then leaps toward the final value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SpringOut
member.summary: Overshoots and then returns.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects
member.summary: Contains values for the EasingEffects enumeration that about to easing effects for indeterminate indicator animation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.BounceIn
member.summary: Jumps towards, and then bounces as it settles at the final value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.BounceOut
member.summary: Leaps to final values, bounces 3 times, and settles.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.CubicIn
member.summary: Starts slowly and accelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.CubicInOut
member.summary: Accelerates and decelerates. Often a natural-looking choice.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.CubicOut
member.summary: Starts quickly and the decelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.Linear
member.summary: Linear transformation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.SinIn
member.summary: Smoothly accelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.SinInOut
member.summary: Accelerates in and decelerates out.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.SinOut
member.summary: Smoothly decelerates.

member.summary: Moves away and then leaps toward the final value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.SpringOut
member.summary: Overshoots and then returns.
